items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice Dress
items.body: Beautiful dress. Well made with nice fabric, not too thin and not too thick. It didn't look good on me because I'm bottom heavy, but it was a great dress. Read more
items.author: MOUNTAIN GIRL

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely dress
items.body: A little snug but I’m keeping it. Read more
items.author: NanaM

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars So-so
items.body: Fit is decent but a little clingy. Fabric is soft but definitely cheap with suspect looking seams. Color was a little lighter than I anticipated but it is comfortable. Read more
items.author: Patito DeGoma

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Dress - Zeagoo 3/4 Sleeve Dress Casual Flowy A-Line Midi Tshirt Dresses with Pockets
items.body: The "Zeagoo 3/4 Sleeve Women's Dress Casual Flowy A-Line Midi Tshirt Dresses with Pockets Crewneck Vocation Boho Beach Sundress" is very nice. The dress seams to be made of good quality material. The floral design is nice and the colors look exactly like the description shows. All of the seams appear to be well done and there are not a lot of loose threads or anything like that hanging from the them. The pleats are well done and look great. One of the best features is that this dress has pockets. Great for carrying your phone or keys. Size wise is about right. The sizing chart said that I would need a medium, but my normal sizes is pretty much right in between a medium and a large, so I went up to the large. It may be a tiny bit too big, but still fits very nicely and I'm sure that the medium would have been a little bit too tight or small, so keep that in mind when getting the correct size for yourself. The dress comes well packaged in a plastic bag so it stays nice and clean during shipping. Overall, great dress for the price, lightweight and breezy, fits and hangs well. Read more
items.author: Jorgey

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and casual dress with great pockets
items.body: I love how casual and comfortable this dress is. The pockets are my favorite thing. I love dresses with pockets. The color is nice and the style is a little busy for me but blends well. The dress is soft and very easy to get on and off. The material and length of the dress is good. The dress is simple and great for summer or winter months with the partial longer 3/4 sleeves. It flows well and is easy to wash. Read more
items.author: Raylinda Hirschi

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Not well-made.
items.body: This dress looks good at first glance, but gets worse the longer/closer you look at it. The listing pictures make the fabric look like it's flowy and drapes well, but in reality, it drapes oddly and poofs out at the seams. It seems like the wrong fabric choice for the style of dress, and is cheaply made. It's the kind of fabric that sticks to your hands if they're dry, and if there's any stress on the fabric (like when you sit, if you put your hands in the pockets and push down at all, etc), the fabric turns white through the blue. The worst thing to me is the poorly stitched seams. I don't think this will last through more than a few washes (either the color or the stitching). All the stitching, with the exception of the hems, look like it's going to rip apart at any minute. If I had paid full price for this dress, I would be extremely unhappy about it. To me, this dress is worth about $12-15 max. The pros with it are, of course, that it has pockets. The length is nice and the floral design is pretty. It's hard to find modest dresses, so that's always a plus for me. Unfortunately, though, it really bothers me when things are cheaply made, and for that fact alone, I wouldn't recommend it. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely and comfy dress
items.body: I absolutely love this dress! The fit is very comfortable (a bit loose), the length is just below the knee, the pockets are at the right length and are large enough to hold my Galaxy Z Fold phone, the material is soft, and it looks nice enough to wear out and is comfortable enough to wear often casually. At just under $30, it's a bargain considering all of these pluses. In fact, I'm thinking about getting another one in a different pattern (but my husband says I have to get rid of something before I can get more stuff). Read more
items.author: Kindle Customer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars It’s Versatile!
items.body: I got this as a gift for my Friend. She Loves it. It fits her perfectly accurately (according to her size). The price is good also. You could wear it casually with Flip Flops, or dress it up with heals etc. The sewing is done well and the material stretches nicely. My only issue with this is that the material itself is a bit thin. Read more
items.author: Betty Lupold

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Mz919, Pink Floral, Green Floral, Coffee Print, Stripe Print, Xh445, Beige +Black Floral, Blue Flower, Navy Blue Floral, Apricot Floral, Sf180, 01-black, Jh529, Red Floral. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
